citations.narrative:
Item Facilities General 3.125 a
At the time of inspectin the outdoor goat exhibit has an area of concrete floor that is broken resulting in gaps which
could injure the animals feet.
Facility needs to repair concrete surface so as to maintain the area in good repair and prevent injury
Correct by 9//15/14
An exit interview took place at the end of inspection
